Service Details: - Offers youth Detox program based on the wellness wheel model and provides residential beds to safely withdraw from substances- Focuses on the whole person: physical, emotional, cultural and spiritual wellbeing- Healthy ways of coping will be explored and Mindfulness Based Relapse Prevention (MBRP) techniques presented- Works with each participant on planning discharge from the program, which includes assistance with safe housing, income assistance, and follow up with counselors, etc.- Includes family in the process and they will have access to transitional counseling to ensure a smoother integration- Program is 5-15 days in duration
